column4: when  i start my computer with 9.04..the ubuntu splash rolls and then i get a black screen with mouse in it ..  i tried the fsck , dpkg and xfix in recover mode... my desktop is not coming up.. i now use irssi in netboot.. anyone can make me to get my desktop back ????????????????
